description: Fern-leaf yarrow (Achillea filipendulina 'Gold Coin Dwarf') is an amazing hardy perennial with striking, fan-shaped foliage. Bright golden-yellow flowers adorn the upright stems from spring to early summer, providing vibrant color to the garden. This sun-loving, drought-tolerant variety requires very little maintenance and will thrive in average-to-poor soil. Its evergreen foliage won't need replacing each year, meaning you can enjoy its unique beauty for years to come. It's the perfect choice for adding texture and interest to low-maintenance garden beds and containers. Fern-leaf yarrow's unique characteristics make it a truly amazing plant.
